com.github.essobedo.appma.spi

Interface VersionManager<T extends Manageable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the application that can manage the version manager.

    public interface VersionManager<T extends Manageable>
    The class allowing to check for new version of a given application and allowing to upgrade the application from a version to another.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Nicolas Filotto (nicolas.filotto@gmail.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task<String> check(T application)
      Gives the task allowing to check for a new version of the specified application.
      Task<Void> store(T application, OutputStream target)
      Gives the task allowing to store the content of the patch.
      Task<Configuration> upgrade(File upgradeRoot, File appRoot, String oldVersion)
      Gives the task allowing to upgrade the application.

    • Method Detail

      • check

        Task<String> check(T application)
            throws ApplicationException
        Gives the task allowing to check for a new version of the specified application.
        Parameters:
        application - the application for which we want to check for an update.
        Returns:
        the task allowing to check for a new version of the specified application.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - if the task could not be created.

      • store

        Task<Void> store(T application,
                 OutputStream target)
          throws ApplicationException
        Gives the task allowing to store the content of the patch.
        Parameters:
        application - the application for which we want the patch.
        target - the stream in which the content of the patch should be written.
        Returns:
        the task allowing to store the content of the patch.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - if the task could not be created.

      • upgrade

        Task<Configuration> upgrade(File upgradeRoot,
                            File appRoot,
                            String oldVersion)
                     throws ApplicationException
        Gives the task allowing to upgrade the application.
        Parameters:
        upgradeRoot - the root folder that contains the content of the patch.
        appRoot - the root folder of the application.
        oldVersion - the previous version of the application.
        Returns:
        the task allowing to upgrade the application.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - if the task could not be created.
